content: I am surprised I haven't seen mention of this here yet. (Did I miss it?) I rely on experts here to help shape my perspective :)

A reader-friendly presentation is also given here:

https://deepmind.google/discover/blog/funsearch-making-new-discoveries-in-mathematical-sciences-using-large-language-models/

Just noticed (from a big quote in the article) that they recruited Jordan Ellenberg as a coauthor this time :)

Also the DeepMind version of the paper is much better than the Nature accelerated version, without big banners across the pages and with the figures correctly inserted.
is there currently any developments on these cap set and FunSearch
